blog.name: bringclarkeback
blog.title: everything else just melts away
blog.description: "all the elements in your body were forged many, many millions of years ago in the heart of a far away star that explosed and died. that explosion scattered those elements across the desolations of deep space, until, eventually, they came together to make you. you are unique in the universe." - doctor who. marie; taurus, istj. blarke is my core, olicity trash, bitter queen. love girls on tv, pro-girls unity. atla/tlok hoe. waiting for the doctor. samwise gamgee saved middle earth. daensa is endgame, & sansa and dany are both queens ; protect the dragons (and the direwolves). sam winchester and jack kline are the softest. korra is bae. thor is the strongest avenger. mcu/dc(tv), lotr, got, spn. [ship and let ship]

body:
Crazy theory

So a while back they had like a game of thrones wrap party. I remember seeing pics of Sean Bean and Jason Momoa and like since then I’ve had this theory that they were also there to secretly shoot scenes or something for a flashback or something like they did in season 2 with D*ny going over the wall and seeing Drogo again. Idk man just something that has been on my mind since the season is upon us.

summary: What if during the battle everyone starts running away from Winterfell splitting the group into two. One group goes to...
body:
What if during the battle everyone starts running away from Winterfell splitting the group into two. One group goes to Dragonstone the other to Riverrun. That would explain why it looks like Daenerys and Jon are at Dragonstone. It would also explain why Sansa has a “fish scale” dress.

What if they get separated then Jon leaves Daenerys to go back with his family. It could be a betrayal for love.

Jon is in danger because he left Daenerys so the starks have to protect him. I would really want the whole protection thing to be early on but what if it happens after the battle.

title: TAKES ITS TOLL IS BACK!!!!!
body:
Remember Takes Its Toll? My magnum opus? The Sansan piece I never should have deleted? WELL IT’S BACK!! Tune back in for all 35 chapters of this beauty, now back and better than ever.

A rootless woman meets a fearless man. Or, how a woman puts down roots and a man finally gains something he’s afraid to lose.

Less serious summary: Sansa works in a tollbooth. Romance with a side of DRAMA, mama. Lots of complex emotions and human beings making mistakes. NOTE: This piece was up before, but some people didn’t get to finish reading it. I kind of regret deleting it, as it was very popular and I am very proud of it! Ultimately, I learned a lot from converting it into an original novel, but Amazon wasn’t where it belonged. It belongs with you, my fellow Sansan fans. I love you all!

Link to Takes Its Toll!

summary: GOT fandom fights are weird man... like... Jon and the siblings??? Jon's probably gonna die to save them all anyway.
question: GOT fandom fights are weird man... like... Jon and the siblings??? Jon's probably gonna die to save them all anyway.
answer:
Yeah for some reason people have this idea that Jon caring about Sansa somehow takes away from Arya lol.

Whether people like it or not though, Sansa and Jon bonded on the show. Sansa brought back Jon’s hope and drive after he was ready to leave and give up on everything after his fellow Night’s Watch men murdered him. And they took back their home together. They may not have been close growing up but they have an entirely new dynamic now. And, guess what, Jon can have this new relationship with Sansa and still love Arya as much as he’s always had. And it doesn’t erase the fact that he and Arya were very close before everything went to shit. He’s allowed to love both of his sisters.

Idk. There’s people who just don’t want Sansa to be loved by her remaining siblings. (That’s why so many of them threw fits when Maisie said that Arya was going to have Sansa’s back in S8). It’s because it goes against the headcanons they made up about Sansa not being a true Stark and unimportant lol.

I do agree that Jon/Arya is a relationship that does deserve more focus though. And I hope that happens in S8 before Jon dies. (Because yeah, I share your opinion that he is likely to die saving the North and his family :( )

summary: So i think maybe the episode 3/4 will endup with an cliffhanger where we will asume that sansa is dead. Maybe even see a body...
question: So i think maybe the episode 3/4 will endup with an cliffhanger where we will asume that sansa is dead. Maybe even see a body that resemblance her with red hair. Just for the next episode reveal that cersei has her. If that happen how would you feel? Do you believe for one second that she is dead? If that happens it will be hell week for me. Just imagine the haters being happy...
answer: I won’t. Sansa has a plot armor far thicker than the armor she’s currently wearing but I think some people will buy her ‘death’ and delight in it so it won’t be the best week of the fandom (RIP the tag) but literally a week later we’ll see her. I hope by the end of the fourth ep, she changes her hostage situation to an alliance
